entry.tran: 有板有眼的；有条不紊的;井然有序的
entry.def: If you describe someone as methodical, you mean that they do things carefully, thoroughly, and in order.

example.ex: Da Vinci was methodical in his research, carefully recording his observations and theories...
example.tran: 达·芬奇搞研究井井有条，会详细记录观察资料和理论学说。

example.ex: It seemed a sensible and methodical way of proceeding.
example.tran: 这似乎是继续下去的一种明智而有序的做法。

auth_sentence.content: He...began methodically stocking his cigar-case from a bundle.

auth_sentence.content: We came back through fields of Longhorn cattle munching methodically.

auth_sentence.content: They began methodically re-examining years of evidence, witness statements and hunches.
